allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding Radia with memory leak fix...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding with memory leak fix (EraseDoubleBufferMulti call)...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''radentry.cpp|Built target|radia.pyd'' | Select-Object -Last 5
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding radia after memory leak fix...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding radia after removing duplicate functions...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding radia with swap trick for memory deallocation...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding radia after fixing Python reference counting bug...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target radia 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding rad_ngsolve...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target rad_ngsolve --clean-first 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 30
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
# Touch source file to force rebuild
(Get-Item src\python\rad_ngsolve.cpp).LastWriteTime = Get-Date
Write-Host ''[Build] Rebuilding rad_ngsolve after touching source...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target rad_ngsolve 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''rad_ngsolve.cpp|Built target|rad_ngsolve.pyd'' | Select-Object -Last 5
")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Import-Module ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll''
Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath ''C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community'' -SkipAutomaticLocation
Write-Host ''[Build] Linking rad_ngsolve.pyd...''
cmake --build build --config Release --target rad_ngsolve 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''Built target|rad_ngsolve.pyd|error'' | Select-Object -Last 3
")
